metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8285 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
curl 7.21.0 to and including 7.73.0 is vulnerable to uncontrolled recursion due to a stack overflow issue in FTP wildcard match parsing.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.12
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.12
libcurl3-nss - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.12
libcurl4 - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.58.0-2ubuntu3.12').
